sn55.31:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.31:1.5: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.31:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako dhamme aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.31:2.2: svakkhato bhagavata dhammo …pe… paccattam veditabbo vinnuhiti.
sn55.31:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako sanghe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.31:3.2: suppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassati.
sn55.31:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.31:4.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro punnabhisanda kusalabhisanda sukhassahara”ti.
